alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:44PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webb County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 17 miles east of Laredo, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, United South High School, Ranchitos Las Lomas and Aguilares. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 794 and 824. US Highway 83 near mile marker 726. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
